fullplot: Never-before-seen testimony is included in this documentary on Emmett Louis Till, who, in 1955, was brutally murdered after he whistled at a white woman.
plot: Never-before-seen testimony is included in this documentary on Emmett Louis Till, who, in 1955, was brutally murdered after he whistled at a white woman.
title: The Untold Story of Emmett Louis Till

tomatoes.consensus: Without sensationalism or flinching from the brutality of the crime, this documentary is an eye-opening call for justice.
